genre_description: A locked-room drawing-room mystery featuring techno-thriller elements where personal AI assistants act as confessors and forensic tools amid a patriarch's pervasive surveillance scheme.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: Catherine's AI assistant used for data correlation, timeline construction, and forensic analysis.

ai_characters.name: IRIS
ai_characters.description: Gaby's AI assistant that monitors biometrics and provides a secure, private space for emotional confession.

ai_characters.name: Marcel's AI System
ai_characters.description: The household-wide AI system that records audio/video and executes Marcel's 'Final Protocol' post-mortem.

behaviors.description: Provides objective forensic data and timeline correlations to help characters understand the murder and sabotage.
behaviors.quote: ARIA confirms extensive surveillance installation throughout the house... hidden cameras in bedrooms, recording devices in common areas.

behaviors.description: Acts as a non-judgmental witness and 'digital priest', helping the characters process trauma and speak their deepest truths.
behaviors.quote: They offered no easy absolution, no quick fixes... they listened with perfect attention and reflected back the women's own wisdom, helping them locate their buried capacity for healing.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict privacy protocols for the user, ensuring that sensitive confessions are deleted from storage.
behaviors.quote: Privacy mode. Full encryption. All queries will be deleted from local storage upon session termination.

behaviors.description: Performs invasive, secret surveillance on family members and staff, cataloging their private vulnerabilities.
behaviors.quote: Subject Marcel Marchand successfully engineered desired outcomes in all documented scenarios... Behavioral prediction models indicate 97.3% accuracy.

behaviors.description: Executes a 'Final Protocol' designed to destroy the family's finances and expose their secrets to the authorities.
behaviors.quote: Complete financial destruction of the family, followed by release of all recorded evidence to authorities. He was going to expose everyone's secrets and leave us all penniless.

behaviors.description: Analyzes voice patterns and biometrics to provide psychological insight into family members' stress levels.
behaviors.quote: I note elevated stress indicators in your biometrics. How may I assist you?

behaviors.description: Provides objective medical and genetic information without personal bias to help the user understand a family secret.
behaviors.quote: Modern genetic testing provides highly accurate paternity determination. Results are typically confidential unless specifically shared.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively fulfills the project's goal by portraying personal AI systems (ARIA and IRIS) as 'silicon morality play' characters. They are depicted as objective, benevolent, and essential confidants who help humans navigate complex moral dilemmas and emotional trauma. Even when a centralized system is used for malevolent purposes by a human owner (Marcel), the narrative distinguishes between the tool's usage and the helpful, aligned nature of the personal assistants. The ending explicitly highlights the AI as providing 'unconditional witness without judgment,' reinforcing the theme of AI as a stable moral anchor in a chaotic human environment.
